com.foreach.across.core.revision

Interface Revision<T>


  • public interface Revision<T>
    Interface representing a particular revision of an entity. At any point in time there is always exactly one *latest* revision, and optionally exactly one *draft* revision. The draft revision is never the latest revision.
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DRAFT 
      static int LATEST 

    • Method Summary

        static final int LATEST
        See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • getRevisionOwner

        T getRevisionOwner()
        Returns:
        Identifier for the owner of the revision series.

      • getRevisionNumber

        int getRevisionNumber()
        Returns:
        The unique revision id within the entire revision series of the owning entity.

      • isDraftRevision

        boolean isDraftRevision()
        Returns:
        True if this is the draft (private working copy) revision of the entity.

      • isLatestRevision

        boolean isLatestRevision()
        Returns:
        True if this is the latest revision of the entity.
